txt.en:
Should I hire a dwarf to assist me with this? No, no... This must remain my secret.

Ancient - Farin
Thirst - Adrus
 Shackle - Bedar
Keeper - Marazâl
Lord - Uzbadu
Throne - Zabad'egam
Hail - Shamukh
Darkest - Uznanul
Shatter - Jalâkruf
Violence - Anrâkh
Voracity - Afrâs
To Eat - Ablagi

To Die - Amradi
To Destroy - Bâmbikhi

He who has been tormented - Mabirabarshân (ME)

The name Throkhâr is Black Speech, not Khuzdul.\nWho is this? Does his name need to be translated or transliterated?\n This cursed tongue of the dwarves is far too complex. I fear I shall never solve this.
This appears to be someone's attempts to translate something

'The King's chosen language'... If the King wears the face of Durin, that must mean Khuzdul.

Most Evil - Udashul
Darkening (Becoming Evil?) - Unragul

Brand - Jalaikrish
King - Zabadâl

He who has been wronged - Mamahhahdûn
